predicate.note: Frames file for 'auction' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: sell at auction

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Indeed. Recently, the trust failed *trace* to auction off the paper mill, a bank, an office building and a small cotton-ginning plant.
example.arg: the paper mill, a bank, an office building and a small cotton-ginning plant

roleset.note: highest bidder/buyer will definitely occur at some point; I'm not sure about price and benefactive though.
